vote.text: Amendment SA 2185 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2185 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5094-5097) To support innovation schools.
